name: Blockchain-based Land Registry Application
description: A Blockchain-based application for managing land registry related activities. Built using the Hyperledger Fabric blockchain platform. Uses Go and Javascript under the hood.

name: Blockchain-based E-Waste Management and Traceability
description: Based on our work for E-waste traceability, this application is based on the idea of traceability of e-waste from their manufacturing to their disposal. The project is based on the Ethereum platform, with smart contracts built using Solidity.
